Subject: EPP-Domänencomputer
Description: Die Gruppe EPP-Domänencomputer wird in EPP als Basis für alle DEFAULT-DENY CAP-Richtlinien verwendet. Mir ist gerade aufgefallen, dass der bezug zu der AD-Gruppe auf einmal fehlt und ich finde die passende Konfiguration nicht mehr.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: 1. Run the AD sync. (The group mentioned does not contain all the users from AD)
What_We_Know__c: After recreating the AD sync and adding the computers to the AD group again the sync worked as expected. (the computers are assigned to the group)
Next_Steps__c:
The customer mentioned an issue with updating the Epp client version.
He will test this and get back to us next week.
Solution_Comment__c:
The AD sync in Epp sever was recreated and the computer assigned to the AD group where removed and added again.
Using  a test version of Baramundi and am running the ZAP tool and the reinstallation of the agent twice in one task. That works.
